sword.description: A simple blade, standard issue to the guards and warriors of Rosacea

scimitar.description: A curved blade, obtainable only by those of the east via secret techniques

dagger.description: A small blade, favored by thieves, cutthroats and duplicitous individuals,

shield.description: A simple kite shield, covers the body from attacks

spear.description: A hardwood staff with a pointed tip, better at a range.

club.description: A large wooden stick, prized by those who prefer a more percussive method; it's extremely heavy.

bow.description: A basic bow, hewn and strung to hunt small and medium game.

longbow.description: A large bow, specifically designed to take down big game and puncture armor.

recurve_bow.description: A curved bow, more powerful than a regular bow with fewer drawbacks

helmet.description: A standard protective device, enough to stop simple blows

chestplate.description: A metal cuirass around the torso, boasts protection at the cost of weight,

leather_boots.description: A basic set of boots, comfortable and capable,

metal_boots.description: A heavy pair of boots, greatly reduces movement for minor protection

hammer.description: A tool prized by smiths and carpenters, as valuable as the things they build,

hoe.description: A tool cherished by farmers, good for moving the earth.

fishing_rod.description: A tool used to catch and reel fish ashore.

apple.description: A staple of the Malusian diet, inexpensive and filling

fish.description: A prime source of protein for those living along the coast.

silver_key.description: A small, simple key, used to open and lock the door it matches.
